statement.text: A lot of survivors have come and gone through my door, each telling a tale or two. Some are a lot stranger than others. What's your tale? Maybe I can help.

response_entry.ref_text: I seen a very strange video.

Never mind. I don't want to talk about it.

statement.text: A scream? Was it by any chance a little girl in a white gown?

response_entry.ref_text: No, it wasn't from a girl.

statement.text: Other survivors have called them different things, like scramers and witches. One guy even said he was sure she was a scout for the undead, if you can believe that!

response_entry.ref_text: I haven't felt right since I heard the scream. What does it do?

statement.text: Hmm, that'd be a first for me. Sorry, I can't help you with that.

statement.text: Well, it's not just a single her. From what I gather, they were in a large choir before the apcalypse happend. From the audio cds I've heard, they sounded amazing. People from all around would come and hear them sing.

response_entry.ref_text: They still do...

statement.text: What do you mean? People still come when they sing? There's no people anymore...

response_entry.ref_text: The undead come.

statement.text: Wow. Really? One could say the girls had life long friends...

response_entry.ref_text: You need to get out more.
Ha! I get it. That was a joke!

statement.text: Hallucinations seem to be the most common thing to experience from it. Things move that shouldn't move. One guy even said it was a shocking experience!

response_entry.ref_text: That seems a bit far fetch.
How can I get rid of it?

statement.text: It'll pass on its own. Just be very careful when you are out and about. even though you know they are hallucinations, a single mistep could end your story.

response_entry.ref_text: Thank you. I'll be careful.

statement.text: I'm not here to judge. I'm just telling you what others have told me. Some of these survivors may be a big unhinged in the apocalypse, but enough have told me similar stories for me to believe it.

response_entry.ref_text: Their stories aren't the only things unhinged around here.

statement.text: Well, alright. Thank you for fixing it.

response_entry.ref_text: Any time.

statement.text: At least I have hammers. You won't get any of mine anymore.

statement.text: Ha! Very funny. I don't get a lot of humour around here. Most people that come through my door was just wise crackers. But not you. Here's a gift for being so witty!
